check, sqrt(2)=1.4142135623731
lib, sqrt(2)=1.4142135623731

check, exp(i)*exp(-i)=(1,0)
lib,exp(i)=(0.54030230586814,0.841470984807897)

check, abs(exp(i*Pi))=1
exp(i*Pi)=(-1,1.22460635382238E-16)

check, exp(-pi/2)=0.207879576350762
i^i=(0.207879576350762,0)

check, euler=(0,11.5487393572577)
sin(ipi)=(0,11.5487393572577)
